questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a main objective of Learning Unit 2?
choices: Recognize common marine species found in Timor-Leste waters
Understand the ecological roles of key species
Identify major threats to Timor-Leste's marine environment
Create a food web diagram for a Timorese marine ecosystem
questions.answer: Identify major threats to Timor-Leste's marine environment

questions.question: What type of activity is included in Learning Unit 2 to help students identify marine species?
choices: Species identification exercise using local guidebooks
questions.answer: Species identification exercise using local guidebooks

questions.question: Which of the following is a key topic covered in Learning Unit 2?
What is the term for species that are unique to a particular geographic location?
Which of the following resources is NOT listed as required for the course?
choices: "Coral Reef Fishes of Timor-Leste" by Gerald R. Allen and Mark V. Erdmann
"A Field Guide to Tropical Reef Fishes of the Indo-Pacific" by Gerald R. Allen
"Marine Conservation: Science, Policy, and Management" by G. Carleton Ray and Jerry McCormick-Ray
"The Biology of Coral Reefs" by Charles Sheppard
questions.answer: "The Biology of Coral Reefs" by Charles Sheppard

questions.question: What type of diagram are students asked to create as part of the activities in Learning Unit 2?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a topic in the lesson plan for Marine Biodiversity in Timor-Leste?
choices: Marine mammals and reptiles in local waters

questions.question: What is the term for organisms that have a disproportionately large effect on their environment relative to their abundance?
Which of the following is NOT listed as a resource needed for the lesson on Marine Biodiversity in Timor-Leste?
choices: Laminated fish and coral identification cards

questions.question: What is the term for the small, soft-bodied organisms that make up coral colonies?
Which of the following marine mammals is mentioned as being present in Timorese waters?
What is the term for the variety of life in a particular habitat or ecosystem?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a type of coral in the lesson plan?
What is the term for relating to the open ocean?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a fish feeding type in the lesson plan?
What is the term for a close and long-term biological interaction between two different biological organisms?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a practical experience or community engagement activity in the course?
choices: Conduct surveys of local fish markets
Participate in coral reef monitoring programs
Lead guided snorkeling tours for tourists
questions.answer: Lead guided snorkeling tours for tourists

questions.question: What is the homework assignment given at the end of the lesson on Marine Biodiversity in Timor-Leste?
choices: Write an essay on marine conservation strategies
Research one marine species and prepare a one-page report
Create a poster on coral reef ecosystems
Conduct an interview with a local fisherman
questions.answer: Research one marine species and prepare a one-page report

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a suggested item to cover in the course?
choices: Success stories of marine conservation in similar developing countries
The role of NGOs and international organizations in marine conservation in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the term for relating to the bottom of a body of water?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as an additional resource for the course?
choices: Great Barrier Reef Marine Park Authority website
questions.answer: Great Barrier Reef Marine Park Authority website

questions.question: What type of marine habitat is mentioned as an example for the food web creation activity?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a topic in the presentation of main lesson content?
What is the term for organisms that build or modify habitats for other species?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a marine reptile in Timorese waters?
What is the ongoing project that students are asked to begin as part of their homework?
choices: Writing a research paper on marine conservation
Creating a photo journal of local marine species
Compiling a personal field guide of Timorese marine species
Developing a marine protected area proposal
questions.answer: Compiling a personal field guide of Timorese marine species

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a warm-up activity in the lesson plan?
choices: Displaying images of various marine species
Asking students to share personal experiences
Conducting a quick poll on interesting species
Playing a marine animal sound identification game
questions.answer: Playing a marine animal sound identification game

questions.question: What is the term for a system of interlocking and interdependent food chains?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a type of fish based on feeding habits in the lesson plan?
What is the suggested duration for the species identification exercise in the lesson plan?
